newsitem.title: USA: Telephone & Data changes financial process.
newsitem.headline: Telephone & Data changes financial process.

text.p: Telephone & Data Systems Inc said Monday it, along with Andersen Consulting, changed its general accounting, accounts payable, procurement and decision support processes in a $21 million project.
TDS said it expects a 23 percent reduction in total accounting and finance costs relative to revenues.
The new system, part of a project called World-Class Information Now, replaces TDS's old financial system which was installed when the company was one-eighth its current size, TDS said.
